attributes.action: 1) promote and encourage cycling as form of transport and recreation 2) Greater investent into cycle networks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is petition for the following actions:

1) Promote and encourage cycling as form of transport and recreation for everyone. Widely promote bicycles as a way for people to save money, improve their health, help protect the environment and reduce congestion on roads. Greater promote the current incentives offered by the government such as 'Cycle to Work'.


2) Provide a greater investment towards cycle networks; create cycle path networks that have greater carrying capacities and offer alternative routes to busy and dangerous (high speed) roads.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
